title: Copperplate and Curlz logo
content:
Does anyone know of any business/organizations/other logos that use Copperplate or Curlz fonts? I know Guiness, but other than that?

author: TrinityS2

comments.content:
The band [Cake](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905212445/http:/www.cakemusic.com/) uses Copperplate Gothic Bold in all caps.

Whereas I would bet lots of logos do make use of Copperplate, I’m not sure who would use Curlz for their logo. Hairdressers?

I’m curious about the juxtaposition of Copperplate and Curlz in a single question. Is it just because they are both widely available bundled fonts that start with C, or is there more to this?
